H0.text: where do the phaeacians live in the odyssey. Corcyra

H1.text: where do the phaeacians live in the odyssey. Ithaca

H3.text: where do the phaeacians live in the odyssey. Scheria

A4.text: Scheria or Scherie (; Ancient Greek: Σχερία or Σχερίη), also known as Phaeacia, was a region in Greek mythology, first mentioned in Homer's Odyssey as the home of the Phaeacians.

A5.text: indicating that Scheria was far away from Ithaca.
